fr.iutvalence.java.mp.epicbattle

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.iutvalence.java.mp.epicbattle.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Kayrak Gerland The class player defines one of the two opponents of the battle. It is compounded of the name of the player and the heros chosen. It could be one of the two sub-class : Human or IA.
